Uses of Class
io.sarl.lang.core.Event

  • Packages that use Event 
    Package Description
    io.sarl.core  
    io.sarl.lang.core  

    • Uses of Event in io.sarl.core

      Subclasses of Event in io.sarl.core 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AgentKilled
      Informs an agent has been killed The context Id can be retrieved via ev.getSource().getSpaceID().getContextID()
      class  AgentSpawned
      Informs the creation of a new agent in a given context.
      class  ContextJoined
      Notifies behaviors the agent has joined a new superholon
      class  ContextLeft
      Notifies behaviors the agent has left a superholon
      class  Destroy
      Notifies the Destruction of the agent.
      class  Initialize
      Initialization event for an Agent.
      class  MemberExcluded
      Notifies other members the member with agentID was excluded (forced to leave) the holon context parentContextID
      class  MemberJoined
      Notifies other members the member with agentID has effectively integrated the holon context.
      class  MemberLeft
      Notifies other members the member with agentID has left the holon context
      class  SpaceCreated
      Informs the creation of a new space in a given context.
      class  SpaceDestroyed
      Informs the destruction of a space in a given context.
      Methods in io.sarl.core with parameters of type Event 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DefaultContextInteractions.emit(Event e)
      Emits a given event with no scope (all registered agent) in the DefaultSpace of the DefaultContext.
      void DefaultContextInteractions.emit(Event e, Scope<Address> scope)
      Emits a given event with the provided scope in the DefaultSpace of the DefaultContext.
      void DefaultContextInteractions.receive(UUID receiver, Event e)
      Inverse signature of send.
      void Behaviors.wake(Event evt)
      Wake the agent's behaviors reacting to the Event evt.

      protected boolean Agent.isFromMe(Event event)
      Replies if the given event was emitted by this agent.
      void EventListener.receiveEvent(Event event)
      Request the entity to receive a given Event event.
